references: N. J. A. Sloane and Simon Plouffe, The Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1995 (includes this sequence).
maple: A007121 := proc(n)        n!*coeftayl( (1+x)^(x^2),x=0,n) ;end proc:seq(A007121(n),n=0..40) ; # _R. J. Mathar_, Dec 15 2011
prog: (Maxima)a(n):=sum(stirling1(n-2*k, k)/(n-2*k)!, k, 0, n/2); /* Vladimir Kruchinin, Dec 13 2011 */
author: _Simon Plouffe_
extensions: Signs added by _R. J. Mathar_, _Vladimir Kruchinin_, Dec 15 2011
